creditline: Gift of Frank Jewett Mather Jr.
markings:
Stamped in ink, verso lower left: [crown over mark] [Lugt 2879]
Stamped in ink, verso lower left: [M in square] [Lugt 1853a]

texts.textentryhtml:
Von Heyl zu Herrnsheim; C. Loeser(?);

From Fabriczy, "Un taccuino...": Sold P. G. Gutekunst, Stuttgart, 25-26 May, 1903; #8, thence to C. Loeser coll., Florence. (See reference Bib. 4934).;
